name: Human Branding
description:
Human Branding is a strategic research consultancy. We leverage Applied Anthropology to create game-changing business results for our clients around the world. Central to our approach is the Anthropological principle that 80% of what drives human behaviour lives at a subconscious and "hidden" level and must be unearthed using a non-traditional approach to research.
We are known for our unique ability to uncover what is "hidden" and translate this into strategic solutions for our clients that are both highly influential and enduring.
